title: Crash in v3.2.0 if android:scaleType="fitCenter" is set
body:
If the user uses 3.2.0 dependency and uses the below code in the layout xml he will notice that the app crashes with below lines.
In version 3.1.0 this crash doesn't occur.

        <com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView
            android:id="@+id/soccer"
            android:layout_width="match_parent"
            android:layout_height="300dp"
            android:layout_centerInParent="true"
            android:layout_margin="20dp"
            android:scaleType="fitCenter"
            app:lottie_autoPlay="true"
            app:lottie_fileName="soccer-field.json"
            app:lottie_loop="true" />

```
     Caused by: android.view.InflateException: Binary XML file line #15: Error inflating class com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView
     Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: Attempt to invoke virtual method 'void com.airbnb.lottie.LottieDrawable.setScaleType(android.widget.ImageView$ScaleType)' on a null object reference
        at com.airbnb.lottie.LottieAnimationView.setScaleType(LottieAnimationView.java:847)
 E/AndroidRuntime:     at android.widget.ImageView.<init>(ImageView.java:171)
        at android.widget.ImageView.<init>(ImageView.java:145)
        at androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView.<init>(AppCompatImageView.java:72)
        at androidx.appcompat.widget.AppCompatImageView.<init>(AppCompatImageView.java:68)
```
